summary: WHEN DRIVING IN THE RAIN AND GOING THROUGH PUDDLES OF WATER THE STEERING WILL GO OUT. WITHIN MINUTES THE BATTERY LIGHT WILL COME ON. I DOUBT IT IS MY BATTERY BECAUSE IT IS ONLY A YEAR OLD. THE ONLY WAY I AM ABLE TO GAIN THE POWER STEERING BACK IS BY PULLING OVER TURNING VEHICLE OFF AND RESTART. THIS HAS BEEN VERY DANGEROUS AT TIMES BECAUSE IT HAS HAPPENED A FEW TIMES WHEN I ACTUALLY TURNING IN A CURVE OR A PARKING SPOT. I HAVE ALMOST WRECKED NUMEROUS TIMES SCARING ME AND MY TEENAGE BOYS.
